channel.title: Live Coverage on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Live Coverage on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Apple Event Live Blog: Updates on iPhone 17, iPhone Air, Apple Watch 11, AirPods Pro 3
item.description: Join us for live coverage of the launch of the iPhone 17, iPhone Air, and Apple Watch Series 11. We’ll be reporting from Apple headquarters in Cupertino, California.
